pr.title: feat(family): My list plumbing (user_list_items + Want/Have/Gift), wire /family and Discover
pr.rollback: Revert PR. DB: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS public.user_list_items CASCADE; then restore get_my_subnav_stats from 202602190000 if needed.

receipt.goal: Real persistent My list (Want/Have/Gift); wire /family to real counts and items; wire Discover Save idea and Have them to user_list_items.
commands_run: cd web && pnpm install && pnpm run build
qa_steps: Apply migration in Supabase SQL Editor; run verification script
Sign in; go to /discover; click Save idea on a category â†’ confirm saved
Go to /family; confirm Ideas count and item appear
Toggle Gift on for an item; confirm Gifts count and Gifts tab
Toggle Want off; confirm Gift clears and counts update
receipt.rollback: Revert PR. DB: DROP TABLE user_list_items CASCADE; optionally restore get_my_subnav_stats.
